name: Zenith
ability: Each night*, choose any number of players: if they are on the same team, they cannot die tonight.

name: Calamity
ability: The 1st time you are executed, all living players die & all dead players come back to life. You stay dead.

name: Elixir
ability: You cannot die from execution if you were nominated by a fated.

name: Sleepwalker
ability: You do not know you are a Peacebroker. You think that you are either Vile or Fatebound.

name: Cutthroat
ability: Each night*, choose a player who was nominated today: they die.

name: Savage
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they are not on the same team as last executee, they die.

name: Wanton
ability: Each night*, if an evil player nominated today, all non-evil players are poisoned tonight. Otherwise, a player dies tonight.

name: Neolith
ability: Each night, mark a living unmarked player. If a marked player dies, all marked players are poisoned until dusk. Otherwise, a player dies tonight.

name: Weaver
ability: You start knowing the entire Grimoire. Players of your alignment register falsely to you in the Grimoire you see.

name: Seeker
ability: You start knowing a player & their alignment. When the player you know dies, you learn another.

name: Mangler
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players (not yourself): they swap alignments.

name: Apostle
ability: Each night*, you become the alignment of the 1st player who nominated. If you win & you are not fated, you become fated and lose instead.
